traits.name: Lightning Blood
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the death kiss takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage whenever it hits the death kiss with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The death kiss makes three tentacle attacks. Up to three of these attacks can be replaced by Blood Drain, one replacement per tentacle grappling a creature

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the death kiss can't use the same tentacle on another target. The death kiss has ten tentacles.

actions.name: Blood Drain
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by a tentacle of the death kiss must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10 damage) lightning damage, and the death kiss regains half as many hit points.
